short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halloween Memory is a Memory game. Match all the identical cards before time runs out

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halloween Memory is a Memory game. Match all the identical cards before time runs out! This game has 14 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity, and the game is ideally suited for mobile devices.
